channel.title: Social Impact on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Social Impact on FinanClub

item.title: TFC
item.description: score:-8 Chances: Truist Financial announces commitments to support affordable housing and economic mobility programs. Participation in industry conferences to present company’s strategies and outlook. Collaborative efforts with MIT Solve for social impact initiatives. Investment in hospitality commerce platform GoTab signals innovation and expansion.

item.title: GEN
item.description: score:1182 Chances: Gen Digital experiences a gain with positive Earnings Per Share (EPS). Gen Digital offers cybersecurity solutions, identity protection, and privacy solutions. Gen Digital’s Q1 results show strong customer growth, global expansion benefits, and Avast acquisition impact. Gen Digital releases its fiscal year 2024 first-quarter results.
